import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from 'axios' import Navbar from './Navbar'; import DisplayError from './DisplayError' import { BrowserRouter as Router } from 'react-router-dom'; const initialState = { data: { skills: '', company: '', portfolio: '', linkedIn: '', instagram: '', facebook: '', twitter: '', college: '', degree: '', branch: '', batch: '', cfUserName: '', cfRating: '', cfMaxRating: '', cfRank: '', ccUserName: '', ccRating: '', ccMaxRating: '', ccRank: '' }, errors: { cfUserNameError: '', ccUserNameError: '' }, } function AddProfile(){ const [ profile, setProfile ] = useState({ data: { skills: '', company: '', portfolio: '', linkedIn: '', instagram: '', facebook: '', twitter: '', college: '', degree: '', branch: '', batch: '', cfUserName: '', cfRating: '', cfMaxRating: '', cfRank: '', ccUserName: '', ccRating: '', ccMaxRating: '', ccRank: '' }, errors: { cfUserNameError: '', ccUserNameError: '' }, }) const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(profile) axios.all([ axios.get(`https://competitive-coding-api.herokuapp.com/api/codeforces/${profile.data.cfUserName}`), axios.get(`https://competitive-coding-api.herokuapp.com/api/codechef/${profile.data.ccUserName}`) ]).then(axios.spread((res1, res2) => { let cfUserNameError='', ccUserNameError=''; if(res1.data.status==='Failed'){ cfUserNameError = 'Please enter valid codeforces handle' } if(res2.data.status==='Failed'){ ccUserNameError = 'Please enter valid codechef handle' } if(cfUserNameError || ccUserNameError) { setProfile({ ...profile, errors: { cfUserNameError, ccUserNameError }}) } })) console.log(profile.data) /*try { const res1 = await axios.get(`https://competitive-coding-api.herokuapp.com/api/codeforces/${profile.data.cfUserName}`) if(res1.data.status==='Failed'){ setProfile({ ...profile, errors: { ...profile.errors, cfUserNameError: 'Please enter valid codeforces handle' } }) } const res2 = await axios.get(`https://competitive-coding-api.herokuapp.com/api/codechef/${profile.data.ccUserName}`) /*if(res2.data.status==='Failed'){ setProfile({ ...profile, errors: { ...profile.errors, ccUserNameError: 'Please enter valid codechef handle' } }) } console.log(profile.errors) console.log(res1.data.status) console.log(res2.data.status) } catch( error ) { console.log(error.response) }*/ } return (

My account

setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, college: e.target.value}}) } />
